ExposedProperty.EPLabel: The name and path to the rules file.
ExposedProperty.Name: ExposedProperty spirent.methodology.RunPyScriptCommand.Params.rulesfilename

ExposedProperty.EPLabel: The number of positions that the streamblock weights will rotate.
ExposedProperty.Name: ExposedProperty spirent.methodology.RunPyScriptCommand.Params.rotate

ExposedProperty.EPLabel: Number of copies to make per Target Tag object
ExposedProperty.Name: ExposedProperty spirent.methodology.LoadTemplateCommand.copiesperparent.1

ExposedProperty.EPLabel: Number of copies to make per Target Tag object
ExposedProperty.Name: ExposedProperty spirent.methodology.LoadTemplateCommand.copiesperparent.2

ExposedProperty.EPLabel: Starting point to step down to achieve stability.
ExposedProperty.Name: ExposedProperty spirent.methodology.StabilityBackoffIteratorCommand.MaxVal.2

spirent.methodology.IterationGroupComman.Name: Iterate Down Rate To Adequate Performance

spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.SqlQueryList: {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', AvgJitter AS 'RFC 4689 Avg Jitter (us)', '50' AS 'Expected RFC 4689 Avg Jitter (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults As RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE AvgJitter > 50} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxJitter AS 'Max Jitter (us)', '200' AS 'Expected Max Jitter (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults As RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE MaxJitter > 200} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', AvgLatency AS 'Avg Latency (us)', '700' AS 'Expected Avg Latency (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE AvgLatency > 700} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxLatency AS 'Max Latency (us)', '1000' AS 'Expected Max Latency (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE MaxLatency > 1000} {SELECT StreamBlockName AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', TxRes.FrameCount - RxRes.FrameCount As 'Packet Loss', '0' AS 'Expected Frame Loss' From RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS TxRes JOIN Streamblock AS Sb ON RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = TxRes.ParentStreamblock AND TxRes.ParentStreamblock = Sb.Handle WHERE TxRes.FrameCount - RxRes.FrameCount > 0} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', OutSeqFrameCount AS 'Out of Order Packet Count', '0' AS 'Expected Max Out of Order Packet Count' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE OutSeqFrameCount > 0} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', LateFrameCount AS 'Late Packet Count', '0' AS 'Expected Max Late Packet Count' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE LateFrameCount > 0}
spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.PassedVerdictExplanationList: {RFC4689 Avg Jitter within max threshold.} {Max Jitter within max threshold.} {Avg Latency within max threshold.} {Max Latency within max threshold.} {No Packet Loss detected.} {No Out of Order Packets detected.} {No Late Packets detected.}
spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.FailedVerdictExplanationList: {RFC4689 Avg Jitter exceeds max threshold.} {Max Jitter exceeds max threshold.} {Avg Latency exceeds max threshold.} {Max Latency exceeds max threshold.} {Packet Loss detected.} {Out of Order Packets detected.} {Late Packets detected.}
spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.Name: Verify Rate Stability

SequencerComment.Text: *** Sample And Cache Performance With Increasing Nonconforming Streams ***
SequencerComment.Name: Comment

spirent.methodology.IteratorConfigRotate.Name: Configurators: Iterator Config Rotate Traffic Mix Weights Command 1

spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.SqlQuery: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%dstMac' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'DST MAC', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%srcMac' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'SRC MAC', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%destAddr' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'DST IP', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%sourceAddr' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'SRC IP' FROM RangeModifier AS r WHERE r.ParentHnd in (SELECT DISTINCT Rm.ParentHnd FROM Tag JOIN RelationTable AS Rt ON Tag.Handle = Rt.TargetHnd JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS Tx ON Tx.ParentStreamBlock = Rt.SourceHnd JOIN RxEotStreamResults AS Rx ON Tx.StreamId = Rx.Comp32 JOIN RangeModifier AS Rm ON Rm.ParentHnd = Rt.SourceHnd WHERE Tx.FrameCount > 0 AND Rx.FrameCount > 0 AND Tag.Name = 'Bad.ttStreamBlock') GROUP BY r.ParentHnd
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.PassedVerdictExplanation: The DUT properly blocked the non-conforming traffic.
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.FailedVerdictExplanation: The DUT failed to block the non-conforming traffic.
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.Name: Verify Invalid Traffic Was Blocked

spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.SqlQuery: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%dstMac' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'DST MAC', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%srcMac' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'SRC MAC', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%destAddr' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'DST IP', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%sourceAddr' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'SRC IP' FROM RangeModifier AS r WHERE r.ParentHnd in (SELECT DISTINCT Rm.ParentHnd FROM Tag JOIN RelationTable AS Rt ON Tag.Handle = Rt.TargetHnd JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS Tx ON Tx.ParentStreamBlock = Rt.SourceHnd JOIN RxEotStreamResults AS Rx ON Tx.StreamId = Rx.Comp32 JOIN RangeModifier AS Rm ON Rm.ParentHnd = Rt.SourceHnd WHERE Tag.Name = 'Good.ttStreamBlock' AND Tx.FrameCount > 0 AND Rx.FrameCount < Tx.FrameCount) GROUP BY r.ParentHnd
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.PassedVerdictExplanation: The DUT properly allowed conformant traffic to pass through.
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.FailedVerdictExplanation: The DUT improperly blocked conformant traffic from passing through.
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.Name: Verify Valid Traffic Passed Through

spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.SqlQueryList: {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', AvgJitter AS 'RFC 4689 Avg Jitter (us)', '50' AS 'Expected RFC 4689 Avg Jitter (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults As RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE AvgJitter > 50} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxJitter AS 'Max Jitter (us)', '200' AS 'Expected Max Jitter (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults As RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE MaxJitter > 200} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', AvgLatency AS 'Avg Latency (us)', '700' AS 'Expected Avg Latency (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE AvgLatency > 700} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxLatency AS 'Max Latency (us)', '1000' AS 'Expected Max Latency (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE MaxLatency > 1000} {SELECT StreamBlockName AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', TxRes.FrameCount - RxRes.FrameCount As 'Packet Loss', '0' AS 'Expected Frame Loss' From RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS TxRes JOIN Streamblock AS Sb ON RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = TxRes.ParentStreamblock AND TxRes.ParentStreamblock = Sb.Handle WHERE TxRes.FrameCount - RxRes.FrameCount > 0} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', OutSeqFrameCount AS 'Out of Order Packet Count', '0' AS 'Expected Max Out of Order Packet Count' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE OutSeqFrameCount > 0} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', LateFrameCount AS 'Late Packet Count', '0' AS 'Expected Max Late Packet Count' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE LateFrameCount > 0}
spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.PassedVerdictExplanationList: {RFC4689 Avg Jitter within max threshold.} {Max Jitter within max threshold.} {Avg Latency within max threshold.} {Max Latency within max threshold.} {No Packet Loss detected.} {No Out of Order Packets detected.} {No Late Packets detected.}
spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.FailedVerdictExplanationList: {RFC4689 Avg Jitter exceeds max threshold.} {Max Jitter exceeds max threshold.} {Avg Latency exceeds max threshold.} {Max Latency exceeds max threshold.} {Packet Loss detected.} {Out of Order Packets detected.} {Late Packets detected.}
spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.Name: Verify Basic Errors

spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.SqlQuery: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%dstMac' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'DST MAC', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%srcMac' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'SRC MAC', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%destAddr' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'DST IP', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%sourceAddr' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'SRC IP' FROM RangeModifier AS r WHERE r.ParentHnd in (SELECT DISTINCT Rm.ParentHnd FROM Tag JOIN RelationTable AS Rt ON Tag.Handle = Rt.TargetHnd JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS Tx ON Tx.ParentStreamBlock = Rt.SourceHnd JOIN RxEotStreamResults AS Rx ON Tx.StreamId = Rx.Comp32 JOIN RangeModifier AS Rm ON Rm.ParentHnd = Rt.SourceHnd WHERE Tx.FrameCount > 0 AND Rx.FrameCount > 0 AND Tag.Name = 'Bad.ttStreamBlock') GROUP BY r.ParentHnd

spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.FailedVerdictExplanation: The DUT failed to block the non-conforming traffic.
spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.Name: Verify Invalid Traffic Was Blocked

spirent.methodology.VerifyDbQueryCommand.SqlQuery: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%dstMac' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'DST MAC', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%srcMac' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'SRC MAC', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%destAddr' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'DST IP', MAX(CASE WHEN r.OffsetReference LIKE '%sourceAddr' THEN r.Data ELSE NULL END) AS 'SRC IP' FROM RangeModifier AS r WHERE r.ParentHnd in (SELECT DISTINCT Rm.ParentHnd FROM Tag JOIN RelationTable AS Rt ON Tag.Handle = Rt.TargetHnd JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS Tx ON Tx.ParentStreamBlock = Rt.SourceHnd JOIN RxEotStreamResults AS Rx ON Tx.StreamId = Rx.Comp32 JOIN RangeModifier AS Rm ON Rm.ParentHnd = Rt.SourceHnd WHERE Tag.Name = 'Good.ttStreamBlock' AND Tx.FrameCount > 0 AND Rx.FrameCount < Tx.FrameCount) GROUP BY r.ParentHnd

spirent.methodology.VerifyMultipleDbQuer.SqlQueryList: {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', AvgJitter AS 'RFC 4689 Avg Jitter (us)', '50' AS 'Expected RFC 4689 Avg Jitter (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults As RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE AvgJitter > 50} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxJitter AS 'Max Jitter (us)', '200' AS 'Expected Max Jitter (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults As RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE MaxJitter > 200} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', AvgLatency AS 'Avg Latency (us)', '700' AS 'Expected Avg Latency (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE AvgLatency > 700} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', MaxLatency AS 'Max Latency (us)', '1000' AS 'Expected Max Latency (us)' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE MaxLatency > 1000} {SELECT StreamBlockName AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', TxRes.FrameCount - RxRes.FrameCount As 'Packet Loss', '0' AS 'Expected Frame Loss' From RxEotStreamResults AS RxRes JOIN TxEotStreamResults AS TxRes JOIN Streamblock AS Sb ON RxRes.ParentStreamBlock = TxRes.ParentStreamblock AND TxRes.ParentStreamblock = Sb.Handle WHERE TxRes.FrameCount - RxRes.FrameCount > 0} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', OutSeqFrameCount AS 'Out of Order Packet Count', '0' AS 'Expected Max Out of Order Packet Count' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE OutSeqFrameCount > 0} {SELECT Name AS 'Streamblock', Sb.FixedFrameLength AS 'Frame Size (bytes)', LateFrameCount AS 'Late Packet Count', '0' AS 'Expected Max Late Packet Count' FROM RxEotStreamResults AS RxStr JOIN StreamBlock AS Sb ON RxStr.ParentStreamBlock == Sb.Handle WHERE LateFrameCount > 0}
